name: Little Bit War
summary: Occupy all cities! You just place the building on the map! Build barracks and factories! Then units will appear and advance to enemy countries. Build towers and fortresses! Then buildings will attack enemies who came. War funds increase over time. Occupy enemy cities and increase your income. If you occupy all cities, you will clear the stage and get special abilities! Bomb, Repair, Meteor, Missile, Spy, Doctor, Summon Monster, Strengthen Buildings, etc. Special Abilities are over 50! Let's play High-speed RTS!
